name: Mirai's Exam Preparation - The Game
description:
An 18+ Visual Novel style game where you help Mirai through a week of exams. A lighthearted adventure story with adult content.
Based on the comic Mirai's Examination Preparation!
You can find the comic and game on my Patreon

The game is playable on Windows and Mac!

Please let me know if you find any bugs, or spelling mistakes!

Thank you for checking my game out.
